tool_description: Establishes authenticated connections to target systems for role management operations.

system_name.description: Name of the target system to connect to

connection_type.description: Connection protocol: ldap, api, database, saml

endpoint_url.description: System endpoint URL or connection string

credentials_id.description: Reference to stored credentials for authentication

error_messages: Connection failed: Unable to establish connection to the specified endpoint.
Authentication error: Invalid credentials or insufficient permissions.
Invalid connection type: Use one of [ldap, api, database, saml].
Timeout error: Connection attempt exceeded the specified timeout period.
SSL verification failed: Certificate verification failed, check verify_ssl setting.
Invalid timeout: Timeout must be between 10 and 300 seconds.
usage: Provide system_name, connection_type, endpoint_url, and credentials_id. Optionally adjust timeout_seconds and verify_ssl settings for security requirements.

connection_id.description: Unique identifier for the established connection

system_version.description: Version of the connected system if available

capabilities.description: Available operations supported by the system
